item.title: Insights-X: Mapping Report
item.description:
This page shows how to query Hotel-X content mapping using Insights-X API. Access to https://api.travelgatex.com/ Request Format The request input is formed by 2 mandatory inputs: requestDate, mappingReport and 3 optional inputs: supplierCode_in, clientCode_in and accessCode_in. Below the possible values for each input: Mandatory fields:. requestDate: Range of dates when the searches were done. gte Searches done after this date. (YYYY-MM-DD). lte Searches done before this date. (YYYY-MM-DD).
[...]
